title: Spectrum: The dogged, interminable struggle with diabetes
description: DW reports from a special conference in Bochum, where experts from around Germany - and Europe - met to discuss the psychological dimension of diabetes. Why is it so hard to live with this metabolic disease?
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Podcast, Wissenschaft, Diabetes, Blutzuckerspiegel, Spectrum, Gesundheit
